issuesFound.description: Escritor agent shows work completed (A2-12 in 'review' status) but agent state files show NOT_INITIALIZED with no work history

details.data.json_claims: Task A2-12 status='review', notes='Escritor analysis of Chapter 12 provided', from='Escritor'
details.escritor_current-task.md: Status: NOT_INITIALIZED, No active task assigned, Awaiting initialization by CHAD_YI
details.escritor_MEMORY.md: Created: Not yet initialized, Work Log: No entries yet

issuesFound.impact: Cannot verify authenticity of claimed work. Task may be orphaned or falsely attributed.
issuesFound.recommendation: CHAD_YI must verify: Was Escritor actually spawned? Who completed A2-12? Update data.json or agent files to reflect truth.

issuesFound.description: Task A2-12 has status='review' but is not listed in workflow.review array
issuesFound.impact: Dashboard may not display review tasks correctly. Filtering/counting will be inaccurate.
issuesFound.recommendation: Sync workflow arrays with individual task statuses. Add A2-12 to workflow.review.

issuesFound.description: ACTIVE.md is 90 minutes stale and contradicts data.json
issuesFound.impact: Confusion about what is actually being worked on. ACTIVE.md is not being maintained.
issuesFound.recommendation: Either deprecate ACTIVE.md in favor of data.json workflow, or sync it properly. Current: no active tasks in data.json.

autoFixesEvaluated.reason: Cannot auto-fix: source files claim NO work done, but data.json claims work completed. Human verification required to determine truth.
